QuestData.Title: Breaking the Hopebreakers
QuestData.Description:
The Fearstalker has surely sent her hunters across the entirety of the Banewood in search of us, $n.
Draven informed me that some of her top hunters are scouring Dredhollow as we speak. We can use this to our advantage. Slaying them should get her attention.
<The Accuser hands you a collection of bright red vials.>
Throw these on her hunters. It should draw the attention of the devourers infesting this place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Concentrated Anima Vial to defeat the hopebreakers in Dredhollow.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Accuser at the Fearstalker's Manor.
QuestData.RewardText:
Sounds like it worked better than expected.
Perfect. The Fearstalker stands no chance.
